headline: Dominion Energy Declares Quarterly Dividend of 66.75 Cents
summary: The board of directors of Dominion Energy has declared a quarterly dividend of 66.75 cents per share of common stock.Dividends are payable on March 20, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close...
